entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
